title: Tech groups ask Supreme Court to put Texas social media censorship law on hold - CNN
content:
1. Tech groups ask Supreme Court to put Texas social media censorship law on hold  CNN
  2. Court revives Texas social media law against banning users for views  NBC News
  3. Texas has declared open season on Facebook, Twitter and YouTube with censorship law  CNN
  4. Opinion | Absurd Texas social media law shows how GOP debases the courts  The Washington Post
  5. Tech groups ask Supreme Court to block Texas social media law  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Two prominent lobbying groups representing the tech industry's biggest companies are asking the US Supreme Court to step in and block a Texas law that lets the state's residents sue large social media platforms for alleged censorship, two days after a federal appeals court allowed the law to take effect.
